Moment of Triumph.name: Moment of Triumph
Moment of Triumph.flavor: You exhibit a level of pure skill and resilience that few opponents can match, especially in single combat.
Moment of Triumph.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and to all defenses. In addition, enemies marked by you take a -4 penalty to attack rolls instead of a -2 penalty for making an attack that doesnâ€™t include you as a target.

Exult in Victory.name: Exult in Victory
Exult in Victory.flavor: The glory of a hard-fought victory sweeps away your fatigue when you defeat a worthy foe.
Exult in Victory.trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 hit points with a melee attack
Exult in Victory.effect: You use your second wind, and you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Charge To Glory.name: Charge To Glory
Charge To Glory.flavor: You barrel into your enemy, eager to draw first blood.
Charge To Glory.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.
